archimate:Requirement.name: UN_RM_3
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a forecasting duty officer I need to run 'what if' scenarios using different parameters, ensemble member(s) and models (e.g. double forecast rain, add more surge / wave height to a forecast, alter gate settings) so that I can assess catchment/coastline sensitivity to changes in forecast meteorology in relation to local operational activities and communicate the impact of differing conditions.
